name: Battle Baseball
description:
Enjoy idle and fast-paced baseball game. Hit the baseball as hard as you can and sink enemy ships.

☀Basic operation☀
●Drag the baseball player left and right with the mouse

☀Game features☀
●Nice 3D craft and blocky graphics;
●Hits function for "hitting one more time";
●Easy to play baseball fun;
●Fantastic and endless challenge.
